channel.title: Black Mesa/Half life Story
channel.description:
Hi
I played Half Life 1 when i was around 10 years old, but i seem to remember some parts where you where jumping around in some alien enviroment, is that part of the next chapter that will be released? I mean is the storyline exatly the same as in Half Life?

item.title: Black Mesa/Half life Story
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
The alien borderworld section of Black Mesa has not yet been released. Stay tuned.

Read full topic
